column1: These additional symptoms may occur when swallowing a large amount of toothpaste containing fluoride: - Convulsions - Diarrhea - Difficulty breathing - Drooling - Heart attack - Salty or soapy taste in the mouth - Slow heart rate - Shock - Tremors - Vomiting - Weakness
Do NOT give water or milk if the person is having symptoms (such as vomiting, convulsions, or a decreased level of alertness) that make it hard to swallow.
